      • getMessages

        @GET
 @Produces(value={"application/json","application/xml"})
public java.util.List<Message> getMessages(@QueryParam(value="numberOfMessages") @DefaultValue(value="25")
                                                                                                         int numberOfMessages,
                                                                                                         @QueryParam(value="startIndex") @DefaultValue(value="0")
                                                                                                         java.lang.Long startIndex,
                                                                                                         @QueryParam(value="task_id")
                                                                                                         java.lang.Long task_id)
                                                                                                  throws java.io.IOException,
                                                                                                         AppException
        Parameters:
        numberOfPosts - -optional -default is 25 -the size of the List to be returned
        startIndex - -optional -default is 0 -the id of the post you would like to start reading from
        group_id - -optional -if set will attempt to get the requested number of posts from a group.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException
        AppException
